org.openlcb

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.AbstractConnection
      • org.openlcb.MessageDecoder
        • org.openlcb.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SingleLinkNode

    public class Node
extends MessageDecoder
    Default base for OpenLCB node implementations.

    Provides a Connection for incoming Messages. Nodes consume messages to accomplish things.

    Author:
    Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2009
